presentation.controllers

Class PauseViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.controllers.PresentationController
      • presentation.controllers.RegisteringPresentationController
        • presentation.controllers.PauseViewController

  • public class PauseViewController
extends RegisteringPresentationController
    Controlador de vista de menú de pausa. Clase encargada de gestionar los distintos elementos de la vista de menú de pausa.
    Author:
    Rafael Ramírez
